name: Untangled 3D
description:
Enjoy the satisfaction of untangling all sorts of different objects to add them to your collection and smash them at the end.

With so many objects to unlock there is endless satisfaction to be had. There's no way to lose either so take as long as you need to unravel everything!

Earn coins as you go to unlock new worlds full of new items to untangle.

Can you untangle them all?

Untangled 3D features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay
- Beautiful graphics
- Satisfying untangling and smashing features
- Lots of increasingly challenging objects to keep you wrapped up in the game!
